list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of hitting or striking someone or something; a blow.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he received three strokes of the cane
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đã nhận được ba nét của cây gậy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a mark made by drawing a pen, pencil, or paintbrush in one direction across paper or canvas.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the paint had been applied in careful, regular strokes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sơn đã được áp dụng một cách cẩn thận, đột quỵ thường xuyên

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of moving one's hand across a surface with gentle pressure.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: massage the cream into your skin using light upward strokes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Massage kem vào da của bạn bằng cách sử dụng các nét hướng lên ánh sáng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a movement, especially one of a series, in which something moves out of its position and back into it; a beat.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the ray swam with effortless strokes of its huge wings
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: tia sáng với những nét dễ dàng của đôi cánh lớn của nó

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a sudden disabling attack or loss of consciousness caused by an interruption in the flow of blood to the brain, especially through thrombosis.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was left disabled by a stroke
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta bị tàn tật bởi một cơn đột quỵ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move one's hand with gentle pressure over (a surface, especially hair, fur, or skin), typically repeatedly; caress.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he put his hand on her hair and stroked it
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh đặt tay lên tóc và vuốt ve nó

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: act as the stroke of (a boat or crew).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he stroked Penn's rowing eight to victory
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh vuốt ve chèo thuyền của Pennsi tám đến chiến thắng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: hit or kick (a ball) smoothly and deliberately.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Miller calmly stroked three-pointers throughout the tournament
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Miller bình tĩnh vuốt ve ba con trỏ trong suốt giải đấu
